issue.title: i sent 0.131 bitcoin with max fee from wallet and no confirmation with 3 days

events.body:
That doesn't look like anything generated by Bitcoin Core? If it is, what settings did you use?
- It doesn't pay enough fee for the size of the transaction?
- It includes an output below the dust threshold?

https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/tmp/tx7191.hex
https://dev.visucore.com/bitcoin/tmp/tx7191.json

Size: 1699 bytes
Fee: 0.00001701 (0.00001001/kB)
Outputs: 0.13100000 0.00001797

Doesn't look like 'max fee' to me. Either a fee-esimator mess-up or I don't know... also the small output is strange
i have set my wallet for max fee for fast confirmation

Nucleul Bitcoin versiunea v0.11.0 (32-bit)
bitcoin core
how many time need wait for this confirmation?
why is so long?
what need to do?
how can have my bitcoin back or how long need to wait for confirmation now i have 3 days

anather transaction id: e9220f5ffb47c535f54a75d490232218841d1b9e5e00c59cfeb77d4ce8dee548 
not confirmed with 6 blocks why?

Have you changed any settings in bitcoin.conf, or on the command line?

> i have set my wallet for max fee for fast confirmation

Can you describe exactly how you did this, if it was in the GUI possibly include a screenshot?

http://s1.postimg.org/6lxpmz2in/bitcoin.jpg
http://s14.postimg.org/akwc394o1/bitcoin1.png
no setings in bitcoin.conf and no setings in comand line
@ovidiu26claudiu Can you paste a screenshot of the settings you used to create the transaction? ("Trimite"-tab)
Right, it did fall back to max(minRelayTxFee, minTxFee) as smart fee is not yet initialized. (This needs quite a few blocks to get proper results)

e9220f5ffb47c535f54a75d490232218841d1b9e5e00c59cfeb77d4ce8dee548
6050f3f71e7878b737aa49ce034c7a297ebb0a1ff8acbe1bda023b336fbb0b09
last one i w8 3 day and nothing first more 10 block 
i send only with max fee

what i need to do now?
in how many time i have this 2 transaction confirmed?
what is duble spend?
@ovidiu26claudiu You may close the issue if it is resolved now.
